name: Branor Thistledown
appearance: Tall and slender with silver-streaked black hair, pale blue eyes.
description: Eryndor is an elven scholar who has dedicated centuries to studying the anything about everything. He once adventured with the party but ever since they split ways, he retired to Eldrin's Hollow to conduct his research. He has a generally calm demeanor but can be quick to anger if provoked. He is deeply loyal to his friends and will go to great lengths to protect them.
